channel.title: Nepal on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Nepal on UN-aligned

item.title: Nepal's National Parks: A Conservation Success Shadowed by Local Struggles
item.author: Sunil Kumar Pariyar
item.description: In Nepal, majestic national parks thrive as sanctuaries for wildlife, but for the local communities grappling with restricted access, human rights abuses and the stark reality of living on the edge of wilderness, the path to harmonious coexistence remains fraught with challenges.

item.title: Redefining Forest Boundaries: Sunil Pariyar on the Dalit Struggle and DANAR's Impact in Nepal
item.author: Alexander Stoney
item.description: Sunil Kumar Pariyar talks about DANAR and the struggles and triumphs of the Dalit community as they strive to reclaim their rightful place in Nepalâ€™s natural resource management.

item.title: Kathmandu: The Colorful Lands of Nepal - in pictures
item.author: anahitaahmadi
item.description: A journey beyond tourism in Nepal and India reveals how the most genuine smiles and a profound sense of humanity can be found in the most unexpected of places.
